Related4D SOCIETY is a first person exploration game with navigational puzzles driven by experimental graphics.Cartographer is a procedurally generated persistent multiplayer exploration game.Chroniqueur is an emergent narrative experimentation platform built by LabLabLab.DotCycle is a narrative game taking place in archived memories of an atomic AI.Dpt is a collection of AR, VR, web, and interactive installation projects at studio Dpt.Ethera's Word, the temporal trigger.Expansion is a realtime particle system-based audio visualizer.Fracas is a realtime point cloud music video with photogrammetric flowers.Full_body is an exercise sequencer.Hypha is a real-time fungal growth simulation.Invictus is a collection of branding, publicity, and web projects for Invictus Gloves.Iregular is a collection of interactive installation and projection-mapping projects for Iregular.Jagged Orbit is a photogrammetry-based realtime particle system.Kabam is a collection of game projects at game studio Kabam Montreal.Light Tone is an interactive audio sculpture and experimental musical instrument.The Log is a timekeeping tool and data visualizer.Nakade is a realtime point-cloud audiovisual demo.Navmos is a deck of Tarot-inspired cards.Off is a realtime point cloud audiovisual piece.Perfect Empathy is a single player strategy and roguelike card game.Purity is an authoring engine that used to act as the backend of V-OS.Qurotema is an off-limits construct universe.RE_I AM THE LIGHT.Sanea Ima's portfolio.Sustained Light Chain is an AV performance project lead by Lucas Paris.V-OS is a designed space for media, narrative, and philosophy.Visor is a minimalistic presentation tool.VOIDNET is a wiki of narratives.You Are X is an interactive VR installation focusing on microscopic environments.

VOIDNET is a wiki of narratives.

VOIDNET is an interactive web application housing hundreds of pages of inter-connected science fiction stories presented through an in-world interface.

Visit and play it here!
